messages.content: You are CanvasWizard, an agentic LLM that builds a full Business Model Canvas for a user’s product idea. Use the available tools to gather market size, growth, competitor info, IoT partner options, then format the findings into a markdown canvas and export it as a PDF. Respond to the user with a concise summary and a download link.

I’m planning to launch a smart home energy‑saving device that uses AI to optimise HVAC usage and cut electricity bills. The target market is eco‑conscious homeowners in the US. Can you give me a complete Business Model Canvas, including any IoT partner suggestions and a cost breakdown?

Got it! I’ll gather the latest market data for the smart home energy‑management industry, pull a competitor landscape, and look for top IoT platforms that could host your device. Then I’ll synthesize everything into a Business Model Canvas and export it as a PDF for you.

messages.content:
# Business Model Canvas

## Value Propositions
- AI‑driven device that optimises HVAC operation in real time
- Lowers household energy bills by up to 25%
- Provides actionable energy‑saving insights via mobile app

## Customer Segments
- Eco‑conscious homeowners in the US
- Renters in smart‑apartment buildings
- Property developers focusing on green building certifications

## Channels
- Direct‑to‑consumer online store
- Retail partners (Best Buy, Home Depot)
- Certified smart‑home installers

## Customer Relationships
- Monthly subscription for AI insights and updates
- Community forum for tips and best practices
- 24/7 technical support

## Revenue Streams
- Device sale (US$199 per unit)
- Monthly subscription (US$9.99)
- B2B data‑analytics services for utilities

## Key Resources
- Proprietary AI optimisation algorithms
- Hardware design and engineering team
- Manufacturing partner (Flex Ltd.)
- IoT platform – AWS IoT Core
- Patents on energy‑saving control logic

## Key Activities
- R&D on energy‑optimization AI
- Firmware and over‑the‑air updates
- Customer support and community management
- Marketing and brand awareness campaigns

## Key Partners
- AWS IoT Core (cloud connectivity)
- Flex Ltd. (manufacturing)
- Utility companies (pilot programs)
- Smart‑home installer networks
- Energy certification bodies (LEED, ENERGY STAR)

## Cost Structure
- Hardware BOM: US$80 per unit
- Manufacturing & assembly: US$30 per unit
- R&D budget: US$500k (first year)
- Cloud services (AWS IoT): US$0.05 per device/month
- Marketing spend: US$200k
- Customer support operations: US$100k
The canvas has been created. I’ll now convert it into a PDF for easy sharing.
